text: niveste bayasidaru patniyara naduve sampurna n'yaya palisalu nimage sadhyavagadu. Adare (avaralli yara kadegu) sampurna vali bidabedi hagu (yarannu) sampurnavagi nirlaksisi jotaduva sthitiyalli bittu bidabedi. Nivu sudharisikondare mattu dharmanisthe palisidare (nimage tilidirali) â€“ allahanu khandita ksamasilanu karunamayiyu agiddane
